title: Tax Cut Promises Kept & Forgotten
description:
It has been almost one year since President Trump signed his Republican tax bill into law. It was sweeping legislation that re-wrote the tax code and it came with a lot of promises. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg wealth and taxes reporter Ben Steverman on the promises kept and the promises broken. 
FOLLOW UP
 Ben's latest report: 
You can follow Ben at: @BSteverman
---
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends
